title: Wine&Dine
description: Dolores Chance.When I was falling apart, I fell in love.It wasn’t supposed to happen like this. I ran away from life and ended up running into…his dog.Actually, his dog ran into me. I don’t care for dogs. Then I met the owner. Garrett Fox.When my neighbor’s sister came to visit,I promised to show her around town. I’m an investor in things, not people, not emotions.I’m not a fan of love. I’ve been burned before.Then I met Dolores.When a sexy mature, man-of-means encounters a silver vixen, healing her broken heart might be worth more than gold.Romance has no age limit.
author: L.B. Dunbar
